data.message:
I find you without beard much much prettier and neat. , , , What makes the instrument what you play? Do you practice or can you do that well? Were you at fifthys party? Has he ever celebrated? What are you doing for your birthday Camp fire, grill and a band? Last year was not at all with me. , , Just go eat with the neighbors. I have invited , , , Well the older you get. , , , A cool gift would be something! Or a trip. , , ,
 So, as I said, beard terrible! ! smile 😉😚
